texts.content: {"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,16],"size":8.0}],"text":"人家做直播真的都一定是先定直播价"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,14],"size":8.0}],"text":"这件韩呃法国进口的一个原麻料"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"这件是真正进口的一个法国"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,13],"size":8.0}],"text":"夏天穿起来是嫩感通透肉感的"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"然后呢你看一下这垂的感觉"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"你就算挂在那里有一点褶皱"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"挂在那里一会直接又回弹了"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"很棒啊来准备一下我们的这个忍者"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"真的每天看你直播一点不带寂寞的"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,16],"size":8.0}],"text":"你就算袖子别一点点起来穿也很好看"}
